body: @yegor256 Could you have a look, please?
@volodya-lombrozo maybe it's not possible. Feel free to submit PRs, or just use JSON interfaces

issue.title: feat(#1660): Add support of stargazers. Allows to retrieve list of stargazers from a repo

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
Add Stargazers support:
https://docs.github.com/en/rest/activity/starring?apiVersion=2022-11-28#list-stargazers
This PR allows to fetch a list of stargazers (people who starred a repo).

Actually I had been working for #1660 issue and tried to count number of stargazes, but then I have found more elegant way to retrieve repository statistics. Hence, I hope the changes I made during my search could help somebody in the future.
Related to #1660

issue.title: feat(#1660): Add RepositoryStatistics implementation

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
Add implementation of `RepositoryStatistics` which helps to retrieve statistics from a repo.

Closes: #1660.

issue.body:
The puzzle `1660-bee81507` from #1660 has to be resolved: 

https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/blob/090fbe1618c811e5bcbc4b4a8105f3d8b6f7daab/src/main/java/com/jcabi/github/RepositoryStatistics.java#L47-L57

The puzzle was created by @volodya-lombrozo on 04-Aug-23. 

Estimate: 90 minutes,  role: DEV. 

If you have any technical questions, don't ask me, submit new tickets instead. The task will be \"done\" when the problem is fixed and the text of the puzzle is _removed_ from the source code. Here is more about [PDD](http://www.yegor256.com/2009/03/04/pdd.html) and [about me](http://www.yegor256.com/2017/04/05/pdd-in-action.html).
